articles.title: Tether said to have invested up to $50 million in crypto lender Ledn at $500 million valuation
articles.description: The stablecoin issuer’s previously undisclosed investment valued the lender at about $500 million, according to a person familiar with the transaction.

articles.title: Registered crypto companies must reapply for approval, UK regulator says
articles.description: The FCA said firms wishing to undertake crypto-related activity will be need to be authorized when a new regime starts in October 2027.

articles.title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Trades Flat as Polygon Gains 11.2%
articles.description: Polkadot (DOT) dropped 1.4% and Ripple (XRP) fell 0.9% from Thursday.

articles.title: Bitcoin RSI hints at $105K BTC price rebound as bull signals multiply
articles.description: Bitcoin RSI flipped bullish on several timeframes, leading one trader to a $105,000 BTC price target within "three to four weeks."

articles.title: U.S. added 50,000 jobs in December as unemployment rate fell to 4.4%
articles.description: Bitcoin continued to hold just above $90,000 in the minutes following the report.

articles.title: Rain valuation nears $2 billion after $250 million Series C raise for stablecoin payments firm
articles.description: Rain has raised $250 million in a Series C funding round, valuing the stablecoin payments firm at $1.95 billion.

articles.title: Ripple scores UK regulatory approval via local subsidiary
articles.description: Ripple’s UK subsidiary gained regulatory approval as an Electronic Money Institution to provide payment services, but faces limits on certain crypto activities.

articles.title: Bitcoin’s ‘time-based capitulation’ nears 50 days, echoing conditions prior to 2025 surge
articles.description: The current tight consolidation closely mirrors the April 2025 range that set the stage for the record run above $126,000.

articles.title: Sharplink pockets $33M from Ether staking, deploys another $170M ETH
articles.description: Corporate crypto treasuries are increasingly turning to Ether staking, as companies like SharpLink generate recurring yield from onchain operations.

articles.title: UK FCA signals September 2026 opening for crypto licensing gateway
articles.description: The UK Financial Conduct Authority expects that its crypto licensing application period will open in September ahead of a new regime.

articles.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
articles.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

articles.title: Toncoin drops, falls through key support levels in technical breakdown
articles.description: The decline was accompanied by a spike in volume, suggesting large-holder or institutional activity, and analysts see a risk of continued pressure.

articles.title: Visa-linked stablecoin platform Rain raises $250M at $1.95B valuation
articles.description: The raise values Rain at $1.95 billion after 30-fold card growth in 2025, with the Visa-linked platform planning expansion across multiple continents.

articles.title: Ripple wins UK regulatory approval from Financial Conduct Authority
articles.description: Ripple has gained FCA registration through its U.K. subsidiary, marking a key regulatory milestone as Britain moves to bring crypto into its financial framework.

articles.title: The hidden risk of public WiFi: How a single approval wiped a crypto wallet
articles.description: A crypto user who lost $5,000 from a hot wallet after a stay at a hotel said the real culprits were open WiFi, a casual lobby phone call and one careless wallet approval.

articles.description: Your day-ahead look for Jan. 9, 2026

articles.title: Grayscale forms trusts tied to potential BNB and HYPE ETFs
articles.description: Grayscale registered Delaware trusts linked to potential BNB and HYPE ETPs, an early step that often precedes but does not guarantee ETF filings.

articles.title: Bitcoin holds near $90,000 as trading volumes shrink, altcoins diverge: Crypto Markets Today
articles.description: Bitcoin remained near $90,000 as trading volumes fell. Thin liquidity fueled choppy price action across major cryptocurrencies, while altcoins were mixed.

articles.title: Crypto’s next phase goes beyond new blockchains, a16z says
articles.description: Andreessen Horowitz’s crypto arm said prediction markets, verifiable computing and “staked media” will push crypto beyond blockchains in 2026.

articles.title: South Korea to flip bitcoin ETF stance as part of broader crypto push
articles.description: A new Digital Asset Act will regulate stablecoins, requiring 100% reserve backing and user redemption rights.

articles.title: Vitalik Buterin condemns criminalization of code in appeal for Tornado Cash developer
articles.description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin backs Tornado Cash developer Roman Storm as his legal defense fund surpasses $6 million.

articles.title: Zcash sees developer slowdown as ZEC extends two-month slide
articles.description: Zcash developer activity has fallen to its lowest level since 2021 as a governance dispute weighs on sentiment and ZEC extends a two-month decline.

articles.title: Vulnerability found in Babylon staking code could slow block production
articles.description: A newly discovered vulnerability may enable malicious validators to omit the hash field when posting blocks, leading to validator crashes and slowing block production.

articles.title: Bitcoin and Ether ETFs shed over $1B as early 2026 inflows reverse
articles.description: After a brief January rebound, US spot Bitcoin and Ether ETFs saw heavy redemptions, extending a cautious trend that began after October’s market reset.

articles.title: FCA sets September 2026 start for UK crypto licensing applications
articles.description: UK crypto businesses must secure FCA authorization well before the crypto regime starts in October 2027 or face transitional restrictions on new services.

articles.title: South Korea’s top court rules exchange-held Bitcoin can be seized
articles.description: The ruling confirms that Bitcoin in South Korean exchange accounts is an “object of seizure” under criminal law, aligning Seoul with US and EU enforcement practices.

articles.title: A ruble stablecoin outpaced market leaders last year despite international sanctions
articles.description: A7A5, a ruble-linked stablecoin few outside Russia had heard of a year ago grew the most of any stablecoin, outpacing both USDT and USDC over the past 12 months.

articles.title: Spot bitcoin ETFs extend negative streak, reporting $400 million in outflows
articles.description: Outflows continue to reflect portfolio rebalancing, profit-taking, and short-term caution amid market consolidation, one analyst noted.

articles.title: Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink stakes $170M ETH on Linea network
articles.description: The strategy combines native Ethereum staking yield with restaking rewards and incentives from Linea and ether.fi, under a qualified custodian structure.

articles.title: Bitcoin ETF optimism fades as three-day outflows streak erases early-month gains
articles.description: Bitcoin ETFs have registered a net outflow of over $1 billion in three days.

articles.title: Iran is cut off from the internet: Here’s how crypto could still work
articles.description: Protests began in Iran in response to worsening economic conditions and as the Iranian rial hit record lows against the US dollar.

articles.title: Crypto market crash last October marked end of ‘easy yield’ era: BitMEX
articles.description: BitMEX says the era of easy money via arbitrage trades likely died in the October crash, as a liquidation spiral left many market makers naked.

articles.title: Colombia’s tax authority mandates crypto exchanges to submit user data: report
articles.description: This new requirement aims at preventing tax evasion and enhancing transparency in the local digital asset sector.

articles.title: Australian Regulator Flags Grok in Rising AI Image Abuse Complaints
articles.description: Reports of non-consensual AI-generated sexual images doubled since late 2025, with some involving children, the Commissioner said.

articles.title: Builders behind popular Zcash wallet Zashi to launch new startup 'cashZ'
articles.description: The Zcash protocol remains unaffected despite the governance clash and restructuring with Bootstrap.

articles.title: Masked Gunmen Tie Up Woman in France, Steal Crypto USB
articles.description: France is becoming a European hotspot for crypto wrench attacks, with over 14 crypto-related attacks documented last year.

articles.title: Stablecoin flows could near $56T by 2030: Bloomberg
articles.description: Increased adoption of stablecoins by institutions and countries with economic instability could drive stablecoin payment flows to $56 trillion by 2030.

articles.title: Truebit token crashes 99.9% after hacker drains $26.6 million in ether
articles.description: The attack exploited a flaw in an older smart contract, allowing the attacker to buy TRU at no cost and sell it back to extract ether.

articles.title: XRP slips to $2.12 after liquidations clear both sides of the futures book
articles.description: Traders absorbed a two-step liquidation reset that left price trapped between $2.07 support and $2.17 resistance.

articles.title: Consensys-backed SharpLink stakes $170 million in ETH on Linea
articles.description: The latest deployment builds on its previously disclosed plan to stake $200 million in ETH across Linea and affiliated restaking partners.

articles.title: Bitcoin is now 56.7% green: Here’s how it could get even cleaner
articles.description: Bitcoin mining is accelerating renewable energy deployment, replacing fossil-fuel heating, expanding energy access and cutting methane emissions at scale.

articles.title: US Bitcoin ETFs Clock Three-Day Outflow Streak as Risk Appetite Cools
articles.description: Tactical de-risking and declining investor sentiment are the reasons behind the recent spot U.S. ETF outflows, Decrypt was told.

articles.title: Zcash devs unveil ‘cashZ’ wallet after exiting Electric Coin Co
articles.description: Employees who left the Electric Coin Company en masse on Wednesday are launching a new Zcash wallet, citing the need to return to cypherpunk principles and to scale faster.

articles.title: Truebit’s native token TRU plunges 99.9% after $26 million exploit
articles.description: Ethereum-based Truebit suffered a $26.6 million exploit that reportedly targeted a vulnerability in a smart contract deployed five years ago.

articles.title: Optimism floats OP buyback proposal using Superchain revenue
articles.description: A new plan would tie OP token value to network performance by using half of all Superchain fee revenue for systematic repurchases.

articles.title: Global sanctions linked to record flows into illicit crypto addresses
articles.description: The Global Sanctions Inflation Index estimated there were just under 80,000 total sanctioned entities and persons globally as of May 2025.

articles.title: Bitcoin to hit $2.9M by 2050 as it muscles into global trade: VanEck
articles.description: VanEck analysts said Bitcoin could handle 5–10% of global trade and make up 2.5% of central bank reserves by 2050, driving its strategic role as a monetary hedge.
